Reviews.Title: We love our new Lenovo thinkpad edge E545.
Reviews.Author: Lanette Korver
Reviews.Content: It was hard for us to buy a laptop online but we needed one for our business and still really wanted to have Windows 7 on it with the ability to install WIndows 8 when we were ready to.  This was perfect for us.  In the stores we couldn't find anything with windows 7 anymore so we did some researching online and took the plunge.  Glad we did.  We are very happy with the machine and the company that we bought from.  Machine was ready to go out of the box fully loaded with Windows 7.  Have a disc for Windows 8 when we want to install it and off we go.  Very good service.  Machine came when they said it would.  We could track it.  Box was in great shape.  Overall a wonderful experience for us.  Would highly recommend this to friends and we have.

Reviews.Title: Total lemon
Reviews.Author: A. Hansen
Reviews.Content: I guess the only machines with Win 7 still available are prone to be bad, since nobody bought them while Win 7 was in vogue. They are the dregs, the leftovers.This model at any rate is.The initial box seemed to be all good, fast and smooth until it came to watching video and movies.Whether it was streaming or DVD - same difference - a "running line" was moving or flashing along the screed every now and then.Very disturbing on a brand new machine.Requested replacement which was provided fast and sound.Except - it was worse than the initial box. This one was considerably slower, could not recognize home net printer and still had the "running line" issue.Sent it back.Refund came back timely and with no problems, service is excellent.Very unfortunately the product itself is not.
